alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 7:08PM CDT until August 10 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN RICHLAND COUNTY... At 707 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stiles, or 28 miles southwest of Wahpeton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hankinson, Lidgerwood and Stiles. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
